column5: If you can find me tonight at the Stelco Fishing Club awards night, I might be sitting with JP DeRose.
HA! It's obvious that you knew that I was a safe, 8 hours away eh? Have a great evening.
Aw, wish I could go, Dave sent me an e-mail today but I have to work. Should be a good time though!
Thats too much work for a beer up your offer please.   Art
Not fair Chris, i've never met you, Soneone send me a pic so i have at least a chance to find ya
Where's Waldo a la OFC?  Does it count if we see you in a picture after???????????????????
Stelco awards.....let me know who wins for the most lead shoved in a chinny's belly award....Stelco fishing club hahahhahahaha
its equivelent to an American 24 pack..just sayin...you should be all over this offer

See he is only offering 1 metric beer and that is like 1/2 of an American beer. However it does balance out in the end since the American beer is only 1/2 the alcohol. With this logic it proves your Box of 12 beer is only equal to 12 of our beers.    Art
Not to mention Art, that NO ONE can afford purchasing more than 12 Canadian beers at one time unless they robbed a liquor store first...

Guys, No self respecting Canadian buys his beer in 12 packs! Go big, or go home! LOL  Course, you are correct, you might have to extend your line of credit to accomplish this feat, but 24 is the norm. 28 in some cases.
Exactly!  Probably why my head hurts.......
30 packs of Labatts are on sale daily here at the drug store (Rite Aid)....huh, they call it a drug store but I only buy beer there...  But for $19.99 who's going to complain...
